name: Brad Thomas
personal: In addition, Thomas is the Editor of the Forbes Real Estate Investor, a monthly subscription-based newsletter. Thomas has also been featured in Forbes Magazine, Kiplingerâ€™s, US News & World Report, Money, NPR, Institutional Investor, GlobeStreet, CNN, Newsmax, and Fox. He is the #1 contributing analyst on Seeking Alpha in 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 (based on page views).
bio: Brad Thomas is a research analyst and he currently writes weekly for Forbes and Seeking Alpha where he maintains research on many publicly-listed REITs.
